history.title: Our Heritage
history.text:
Sajad Dates is a brand built on over half a century of passion, expertise, and generational continuity—a story of a family rooted in the scorching yet fertile palm groves of Bam, who, since the 1940s, have intertwined their lives with the date palm. 
 The founder of the sajadi family, relying on local knowledge, respect for the land, and a belief in quality, planted a seed that grew into a towering presence in Iran’s date industry. 
In the following decades, the second generation expanded the family groves, improved harvesting and storage methods, and took the first steps toward packaging and export—marking Sajad’s entry into international markets. 
Tragically, this generation, who were the pillars of the brand’s growth and industrialization, perished in the devastating Bam earthquake. 
Yet the loss became a source of inspiration, not an end. Today, Sajad continues stronger than ever, rooted in that legacy. 
The third generation ushered in a new era with advanced processing units, international certifications, a modern brand identity, and an export development team—paving the way for full entry into global markets. 
Now, sajad Dates stands as a leading exporter of Iranian Mazafati dates, with customers across Europe, Asia, Canada, and the Middle East. With a lasting commitment to quality, sustainability, and customer satisfaction, we remain proudly rooted while moving boldly toward the future. sajad is a story of generational continuity, enduring quality, and a global vision for an authentic Iranian product.

KeyFeatures.title: Key Features of Our Products
items: Handpicked from premium palm groves in Bam
Diverse packaging options: bulk, consumer packs, and private label
Compliant with global standards (HACCP, ISO, etc.)
Suitable for both B2B and B2C markets worldwide
High supply capacity for large and seasonal orders

Advantage.title: Sajad’s Competitive Advantage
Advantage.text: We don’t just sell dates; we are your partner in brand growth. With deep knowledge of target markets and tailored export solutions, we stand as your reliable ally in the global supply chain.

Salam.title: Salam; A New Taste with Ancient Roots
Salam.text:
In a world where speed has replaced flavor, Salam is an invitation to a sweet pause—a moment to savor authenticity in a fresh form. 
Salam, the creative complement to the sajad export brand, was born with a new vision for Iranian dates—to show how a traditional product can be transformed into a modern, healthy, and delightful experience. 
From date chocolates and natural energy bars to youth-friendly, ready-to-eat packaging, Salam is here to connect today’s tastes with ancient roots. Salam represents a new generation of date products: flavorful, healthy, smartly designed, and ready to be part of the modern lifestyle.

SpecializedServices.title: Sajad Dates Specialized Services
SpecializedServices.chant: Sajad Dates – Where Traditional Agriculture Meets Modern Technology
SpecializedServices.abstract: With decades of experience in the date industry, Sajad Dates is recognized as a trusted business partner in global markets. We offer complete and specialized services in the sale and export of various date types from the finest regions of Iran, aiming to meet your needs under the best possible conditions. Our services include:

items.title: Supply and Export of Various Dates from the Best Regions of Iran
items.text: We source and export a wide variety of dates, including Mazafati, Piarom, Rabbi, Zahedi, Sayer, and Kaliteh, from Iran’s top date-producing regions. All our products are packaged and shipped in compliance with international agricultural and hygiene standards, ensuring you can distribute them in your target markets with ease and confidence.

items.title: Bulk Orders with High Capacity Fulfillment
items.text: With our cold storage facilities and dedicated warehouses, we are capable of fulfilling high-tonnage orders within short timeframes. Reliable supply is our core advantage.

items.title: Custom Packaging and Professional Branding
items.text: For us, packaging is not just about product protection; it’s an opportunity to tell your brand’s story. We view date packaging not merely as a functional need but as a chance to stand out in the market. Through custom private labeling, professional graphic design, and a wide range of packaging structures (luxury, economy, export-grade, bulk), your product will be delivered precisely as the target market demands. We help you make a distinctive presence.

items.title: Precise, Fully Automatic Weight Sorting
items.text: Using one of the region’s few date box weight-sorting machines in Bam, we adjust the weight of each box with milligram precision. The result? Uniform, reliable packages that meet export standards.

items.title: Multi-Stage Quality Control
items.text: Before packaging, our products undergo several inspection stages by our quality control team to ensure that only top-grade dates reach our clients. Guaranteed freshness, health, and consistency.

items.title: Export and Logistics Consultation
items.text: If you're aiming for successful entry into international markets, we’re by your side. From choosing the right date variety for your market to selecting the right container, handling export documentation, and pricing strategy, our team supports you throughout.

items.title: On-Time Distribution and Delivery
items.text: Utilizing efficient and reputable logistics networks, we manage the shipment process so that your products arrive on time. Timely delivery is a top priority because we understand how delays can impact your business.

items.title: Full Support and After-Sales Service
items.text: We go beyond just supplying products—we care about your long-term success. From selecting the best date type to final delivery, we stay by your side to ensure a smooth, reliable, and satisfying experience. Our team supports you through every step of the export process.

Nutritional Value.title: Nutritional Value & Health Benefits of Dates
Nutritional Value.abstract: Dates are a natural treasure trove of energy, fiber, and essential vitamins—supporting immune health, heart function, and better digestion.
Nutritional Value.howToConsumeTitle: Dates are a natural treasure trove of energy, fiber, and essential vitamins—supporting immune health, heart function, and better digestion.
Nutritional Value.howToText:
Dates can be enjoyed fresh, dried, or as a purée in various foods and drinks. Eat them on their own, blend them into smoothies, toss them in salads, or use them as a natural sweetener in cakes and desserts. 
Dates are also a popular ingredient in energy bars, snacks, and mixes with nuts and seeds. Sajad Dates, with their premium quality, rich nutrient profile, and zero chemical additives, are an excellent choice for daily consumption and a wholesome addition to any diet.

items: Natural sweetener in desserts and beverages
Nutritious base for snacks, energy bars, and chocolates

varieties.name: Mazafati
varieties.features: Soft, velvety texture; dark near-black color; high moisture; very sweet taste
varieties.uses: Daily consumption; luxury packaging; health-focused markets
varieties.competitive_advantage: Fresh-eating; most popular date variety in Iran and many international markets

varieties.name: Piarom
varieties.features: Semi-dry, meaty texture; low sugar; glossy dark-brown color; unique flavor
varieties.uses: Luxury export markets in Europe & the Gulf; ideal for diabetic diets
varieties.competitive_advantage: Low sugar; long shelf life; known as “chocolate date”; premium export product

varieties.name: Zahedi
varieties.features: Completely dry; amber-to-light-brown color; firm, nutrient-dense texture
varieties.uses: General consumption; baking and date flour production
varieties.competitive_advantage: Very long shelf life; easy handling & storage

varieties.name: Rabbi
varieties.features: Semi-dry; elongated shape; thin skin; reddish-brown color; distinctive taste
varieties.competitive_advantage: Affordable price; high shelf life; very processable

varieties.name: Koluteh
varieties.features: Semi-moist; sweet taste; looks similar to Mazafati at a lower price point
varieties.uses: Cost-effective substitute for Mazafati; emerging markets

varieties.name: Others
varieties.features: Semi-dry; mild sweet taste; light-brown color; long storage life
varieties.uses: European bulk export; wholesale; snack mixes with nuts
varieties.competitive_advantage: Excellent for large-scale export; competitive pricing

packaging.chant: We at sajad Dates are always ready to build close connections with our clients and deliver an unparalleled experience trading authentic Iranian dates.
packaging.text:
In the competitive world of food exports, choosing a reliable supplier of premium Iranian dates can make all the difference in your success. 
At sajad, every variety of date is harvested, processed, and packed under the highest hygiene standards to ensure you receive a healthy, fresh, and trustworthy product. We use optimized packaging to preserve quality and extend shelf life, and we’re prepared to fulfill high-volume orders with precise, on-time delivery.

item: Bulk export: 5 kg and 10 kg sacks
Luxury consumer packs: 250 g to 1 kg
Heavy-duty cartons suitable for sea and air freight

packaging.lastWord: Let’s grow together—partner with sajad Dates for consistency, quality, and a truly seamless export experience.
